Message:
Time passed, and the day I had
to leave the village finally came.

The girls smiled through their
tears as they saw me off.

I had to attend school,
but I promised to come back
when there was a holiday.

But one day,
everything changed...
and I could no longer
keep that promise...

My sisters died.
I lost them in an accident...

Instantly, my bright world
was enveloped in dark clouds.

The first one to
crack was Mother.

It happened one day,
when she started
calling me...Urd.
